vb15:1.3.pli: Atthe ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā, dhamme ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā, tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā, ñāṇesu ñāṇaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā.

vb15:2.3.pli: Dukkhe ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā, dukkhasamudaye ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā, dukkhanirodhe ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā, dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā, tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā, ñāṇesu ñāṇaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā.

vb15:3.3.pli: Hetumhi ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā, hetuphale ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā, tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā, ñāṇesu ñāṇaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā.

vb15:4.3.pli: Ye dhammā jātā bhūtā sañjātā nibbattā abhinibbattā pātubhūtā, imesu dhammesu ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā;

vb15:4.4.pli: yamhā dhammā te dhammā jātā bhūtā sañjātā nibbattā abhinibbattā pātubhūtā, tesu dhammesu ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā, tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā, ñāṇesu ñāṇaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā.

vb15:5.3.pli: Jarāmaraṇe ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā, jarāmaraṇasamudaye ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā, jarāmaraṇanirodhe ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā, jarāmaraṇanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā, tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā, ñāṇesu ñāṇaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā.

vb15:6.12.pli: saṅkhāresu ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā, saṅkhārasamudaye ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā, saṅkhāranirodhe ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā, saṅkhāranirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā, tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā, ñāṇesu ñāṇaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā.

vb15:8.3.pli: suttaṃ geyyaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ gāthaṃ udānaṃ itivuttakaṃ jātakaṃ abbhutadhammaṃ vedallaṃ.

vb15:8.5.pli: So tassa tasseva bhāsitassa atthaṃ jānāti—

vb15:8.6.pli: “ayaṃ imassa bhāsitassa attho, ayaṃ imassa bhāsitassa attho”ti.

vb15:8.7.pli: Ayaṃ vuccati “atthapaṭisambhidā”, tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā, ñāṇesu ñāṇaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā.

vb15:11.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ vā …pe…

vb15:11.3.pli: dhammārammaṇaṃ vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti.

vb15:11.6.pli: Tesaṃ vipāke ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā, yāya niruttiyā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paññatti hoti, tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā.

vb15:13.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ sasaṅkhārena …pe…

vb15:13.9.pli: dhammārammaṇaṃ vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti.

vb15:13.13.pli: Yāya niruttiyā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paññatti hoti tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā.

vb15:15.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti.

vb15:15.6.pli: Yāya niruttiyā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paññatti hoti tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā.

vb15:17.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye arūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasaññāsahagataṃ sukhassa ca pahānā …pe… catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti.

vb15:17.6.pli: Yāya niruttiyā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paññatti hoti tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā.

vb15:19.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti.

vb15:19.6.pli: Yāya niruttiyā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paññatti hoti tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā.

vb15:21.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye akusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ diṭṭhigatasampayuttaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ vā …pe…

vb15:21.3.pli: dhammārammaṇaṃ vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti.

vb15:21.7.pli: Yāya niruttiyā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paññatti hoti tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā.

vb15:23.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye akusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ diṭṭhigatasampayuttaṃ sasaṅkhārena …pe…

vb15:23.13.pli: dhammārammaṇaṃ vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti.

vb15:23.17.pli: Yāya niruttiyā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paññatti hoti tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā.

vb15:25.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagataṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti, vedanā hoti, saññā hoti, cetanā hoti, cittaṃ hoti, upekkhā hoti, cittassekaggatā hoti, manindriyaṃ hoti, upekkhindriyaṃ hoti, jīvitindriyaṃ hoti, ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā.

vb15:25.5.pli: Yāya niruttiyā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paññatti hoti tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā.

vb15:27.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ sotaviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagataṃ saddārammaṇaṃ …pe…

vb15:27.5.pli: kāyaviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti sukhasahagataṃ phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti, vedanā hoti, saññā hoti, cetanā hoti, cittaṃ hoti, sukhaṃ hoti, cittassekaggatā hoti, manindriyaṃ hoti, sukhindriyaṃ hoti, jīvitindriyaṃ hoti, ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā.

vb15:27.8.pli: Yāya niruttiyā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paññatti hoti tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā.

vb15:29.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākā manodhātu uppannā hoti upekkhāsahagatā rūpārammaṇā vā …pe…

vb15:29.3.pli: phoṭṭhabbārammaṇā vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti, vedanā hoti, saññā hoti, cetanā hoti, cittaṃ hoti, vitakko hoti, vicāro hoti, upekkhā hoti, cittassekaggatā hoti, manindriyaṃ hoti, upekkhindriyaṃ hoti, jīvitindriyaṃ hoti, ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā.

vb15:29.6.pli: Yāya niruttiyā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paññatti hoti tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā.

vb15:31.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākā manoviññāṇadhātu uppannā hoti somanassasahagatā rūpārammaṇā vā …pe…

vb15:31.3.pli: dhammārammaṇā vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti, vedanā hoti, saññā hoti, cetanā hoti, cittaṃ hoti, vitakko hoti, vicāro hoti, pīti hoti, sukhaṃ hoti, cittassekaggatā hoti, manindriyaṃ hoti, somanassindriyaṃ hoti, jīvitindriyaṃ hoti, ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā.

vb15:31.6.pli: Yāya niruttiyā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paññatti hoti tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā.

vb15:33.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākā manoviññāṇadhātu uppannā hoti upekkhāsahagatā rūpārammaṇā vā …pe…

vb15:33.3.pli: dhammārammaṇā vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti, vedanā hoti, saññā hoti, cetanā hoti, cittaṃ hoti, vitakko hoti, vicāro hoti, upekkhā hoti, cittassekaggatā hoti, manindriyaṃ hoti, upekkhindriyaṃ hoti, jīvitindriyaṃ hoti, ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā.

vb15:33.6.pli: Yāya niruttiyā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paññatti hoti tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā.

vb15:35.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākā manoviññāṇadhātu uppannā hoti somanassasahagatā ñāṇasampayuttā …pe…

vb15:35.10.pli: dhammārammaṇā vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti.

vb15:35.13.pli: Yāya niruttiyā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paññatti hoti tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā.

vb15:37.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti.

vb15:37.4.pli: Tasseva rūpāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti.

vb15:37.7.pli: Yāya niruttiyā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paññatti hoti tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā.

vb15:39.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye arūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasaññāsahagataṃ sukhassa ca pahānā …pe… catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti.

vb15:39.4.pli: Tasseva arūpāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasaññāsahagataṃ sukhassa ca pahānā …pe… catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti.

vb15:39.7.pli: Yāya niruttiyā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paññatti hoti tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā.

vb15:41.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti.

vb15:41.4.pli: Tasseva lokuttarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā bhāvitattā vipākaṃ vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ suññataṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti.

vb15:41.7.pli: Yāya niruttiyā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paññatti hoti tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā.

vb15:43.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye akusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagataṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ …pe…

vb15:43.6.pli: kāyaviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti dukkhasahagataṃ phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti, vedanā hoti, saññā hoti, cetanā hoti, cittaṃ hoti, dukkhaṃ hoti, cittassekaggatā hoti, manindriyaṃ hoti, dukkhindriyaṃ hoti, jīvitindriyaṃ hoti, ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā.

vb15:43.9.pli: Yāya niruttiyā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paññatti hoti tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā.

vb15:45.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye akusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākā manodhātu uppannā hoti upekkhāsahagatā rūpārammaṇā vā …pe…

vb15:45.4.pli: manoviññāṇadhātu uppannā hoti upekkhāsahagatā rūpārammaṇā vā …pe…

vb15:45.5.pli: dhammārammaṇā vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti, vedanā hoti, saññā hoti, cetanā hoti, cittaṃ hoti, vitakko hoti, vicāro hoti, upekkhā hoti, cittassekaggatā hoti, manindriyaṃ hoti, upekkhindriyaṃ hoti, jīvitindriyaṃ hoti, ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā.

vb15:45.8.pli: Yāya niruttiyā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paññatti hoti tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā.

vb15:47.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye manodhātu uppannā hoti kiriyā neva kusalā nākusalā na ca kammavipākā upekkhāsahagatā rūpārammaṇā vā …pe…

vb15:47.3.pli: phoṭṭhabbārammaṇā vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti, vedanā hoti, saññā hoti, cetanā hoti, cittaṃ hoti, vitakko hoti, vicāro hoti, upekkhā hoti, cittassekaggatā hoti, manindriyaṃ hoti, upekkhindriyaṃ hoti, jīvitindriyaṃ hoti, ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā.

vb15:47.6.pli: Yāya niruttiyā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paññatti hoti tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā.

vb15:49.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye manoviññāṇadhātu uppannā hoti kiriyā neva kusalā nākusalā na ca kammavipākā somanassasahagatā rūpārammaṇā vā …pe…

vb15:49.4.pli: manoviññāṇadhātu uppannā hoti kiriyā neva kusalā nākusalā na ca kammavipākā upekkhāsahagatā rūpārammaṇā vā …pe…

vb15:49.5.pli: dhammārammaṇā vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti, vedanā hoti, saññā hoti, cetanā hoti, cittaṃ hoti, vitakko hoti, vicāro hoti, upekkhā hoti, cittassekaggatā hoti, vīriyindriyaṃ hoti, samādhindriyaṃ hoti, manindriyaṃ hoti, upekkhindriyaṃ hoti, jīvitindriyaṃ hoti, ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā.

vb15:49.8.pli: Yāya niruttiyā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paññatti hoti tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā.

vb15:51.2.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye manoviññāṇadhātu uppannā hoti kiriyā neva kusalā nākusalā na ca kammavipākā somanassasahagatā ñāṇasampayuttā …pe…

vb15:51.11.pli: arūpāvacaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti kiriyaṃ neva kusalaṃ nākusalaṃ na ca kammavipākaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṃ …pe…

vb15:51.12.pli: sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasaññāsahagataṃ sukhassa ca pahānā …pe… catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti.

vb15:51.15.pli: Yāya niruttiyā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paññatti hoti tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā.

vb15:52.3.pli: Tisso paṭisambhidā kāmāvacarakusalato catūsu ñāṇasampayuttesu cittuppādesu, kiriyato catūsu ñāṇasampayuttesu cittuppādesu uppajjanti.

vb15:52.4.pli: Atthapaṭisambhidā etesu ceva uppajjati, catūsu maggesu catūsu phalesu ca uppajjati.

vb15:55.1.pli: Catunnaṃ paṭisambhidānaṃ kati kusalā, kati akusalā, kati abyākatā …pe… kati saraṇā, kati araṇā?

vb15:57.1.pli: Siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā.

vb15:58.1.pli: Tisso paṭisambhidā siyā vipākadhammadhammā, siyā nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammā;

vb15:58.2.pli: atthapaṭisambhidā siyā vipākā, siyā vipākadhammadhammā, siyā nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammā.

vb15:61.2.pli: atthapaṭisambhidā siyā savitakkasavicārā, siyā avitakkavicāramattā, siyā avitakkaavicārā.

vb15:62.1.pli: Siyā pītisahagatā, siyā sukhasahagatā, siyā upekkhāsahagatā.

vb15:65.1.pli: Tisso paṭisambhidā siyā ācayagāmino, siyā nevācayagāmināpacayagāmino;

vb15:65.2.pli: atthapaṭisambhidā siyā ācayagāminī, siyā apacayagāminī, siyā nevācayagāmināpacayagāminī.

vb15:66.1.pli: Tisso paṭisambhidā nevasekkhanāsekkhā, atthapaṭisambhidā siyā sekkhā, siyā asekkhā, siyā nevasekkhanāsekkhā.

vb15:68.2.pli: tisso paṭisambhidā siyā parittārammaṇā, siyā mahaggatārammaṇā, siyā appamāṇārammaṇā.

vb15:71.2.pli: atthapaṭisambhidā na maggārammaṇā, siyā maggahetukā, siyā maggādhipatinī, siyā na vattabbā “maggahetukā”tipi, “maggādhipatinī”tipi;

vb15:71.3.pli: dve paṭisambhidā siyā maggārammaṇā, na maggahetukā, siyā maggādhipatino, siyā na vattabbā “maggārammaṇā”tipi, “maggādhipatino”tipi.

vb15:72.1.pli: Tisso paṭisambhidā siyā uppannā, siyā anuppannā, na vattabbā “uppādino”ti;

vb15:72.2.pli: atthapaṭisambhidā siyā uppannā, siyā anuppannā, siyā uppādinī.

vb15:73.1.pli: Siyā atītā, siyā anāgatā, siyā paccuppannā.

vb15:74.2.pli: dve paṭisambhidā siyā atītārammaṇā, siyā anāgatārammaṇā, siyā paccuppannārammaṇā;

vb15:74.3.pli: atthapaṭisambhidā siyā atītārammaṇā, siyā anāgatārammaṇā, siyā paccuppannārammaṇā, siyā na vattabbā “atītārammaṇā”tipi, “anāgatārammaṇā”tipi, paccuppannārammaṇātipi.

vb15:75.1.pli: Siyā ajjhattā, siyā bahiddhā, siyā ajjhattabahiddhā.

vb15:76.2.pli: tisso paṭisambhidā siyā ajjhattārammaṇā, siyā bahiddhārammaṇā, siyā ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇā.

vb15:78.1.pli: Hetū, sahetukā, hetusampayuttā, hetū ceva sahetukā ca, hetū ceva hetusampayuttā ca, na vattabbā “na hetusahetukā”tipi, nahetuahetukātipi.

vb15:79.1.pli: Sappaccayā, saṅkhatā, anidassanā, appaṭighā, arūpā, tisso paṭisambhidā lokiyā, atthapaṭisambhidā siyā lokiyā, siyā lokuttarā, kenaci viññeyyā, kenaci na viññeyyā.

vb15:80.5.pli: Tisso paṭisambhidā na vattabbā “āsavā ceva sāsavā cā”ti, sāsavā ceva no ca āsavā;

vb15:80.6.pli: atthapaṭisambhidā na vattabbā “āsavo ceva sāsavā cā”ti, siyā sāsavā ceva no ca āsavo, siyā na vattabbā “sāsavā ceva no ca āsavo”ti.

vb15:80.7.pli: Na vattabbā “āsavā ceva āsavasampayuttā cā”tipi, “āsavasampayuttā ceva no ca āsavā”tipi.

vb15:80.9.pli: atthapaṭisambhidā siyā āsavavippayuttā sāsavā, siyā āsavavippayuttā anāsavā.

vb15:82.2.pli: No cittā, cetasikā, cittasampayuttā, cittasaṃsaṭṭhā, cittasamuṭṭhānā, cittasahabhuno, cittānuparivattino.

vb15:82.3.pli: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā, cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuno, cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattino, bāhirā, no upādā, anupādinnā.

vb15:83.16.pli: atthapaṭisambhidā siyā kāmāvacarā, siyā na kāmāvacarā.
